Aug. 8, 1889 D Market Drayton Contest
Market Drayton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
market-drayton-contest
None
Excelsior [Round]
Market Drayton, Shropshire Eight bands entered, 5 attended, but Knutton withdrew on the field in protest at the change of conditions which allowed two well known bands from a distance to enter. Prizes: £20, £10, £5, £3
June 23, 2014, 7:28 p.m. May 22, 2019, 1:06 p.m.
